DynamicsCompressorNodeKnee.summary: The knee property of the interface is a k-rate containing a decibel value representing the range above the threshold where the curve smoothly transitions to the compressed portion.

remarks.para: The knee property's default value is 30 and it can be set between 0 and 40.

para.see: Describes the effect of a knee, showing two curves one for a hard knee, the other for a soft knee.

DynamicsCompressorNodeKnee.value: An .Though the returned is read-only, the value it represents is not.
